wikitext.*:
[[File:Annie Lennox.jpg|thumb|''Annie Lennox'' won an Oscar for [[Into the West]]]]
'''Ann Griselda Lennox''' ([[25 December|December 25]], [[1954]]), is a Scottish singer. She recorded "[[Into the West]]" for ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'', which won her several awards.

She also recorded the less known "[[Use Well the Days]]". This song was not used in the film, but appears on a bonus DVD included with the "special edition" of the film's soundtrack CD.

==Awards==
* [[2004]] – '''[http://www.goldenglobes.org/ Golden Globe]''', Best Original Song - Motion Picture, "[[Into the West]]" 
* 2004 - '''[http://www.oscars.org/ Academy Award]''', Best Music, Original Song, "Into the West" 
* [[2005]] – '''[http://www.grammy.com/ Grammy]''', Best Song Written for a Motion Picture, Television or Other Visual Media, "Into The West"
